definition: surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: In most parts of the country, Songkran extends over a period of 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國的大部分地區，宋干節持續3天。
